datum: Blessed Mother * and inviolate Maiden! glorious Queen of the world! Plead for us with the Lord!

incipit: Indeed thou art happy, O sacred Virgin Mary, and worthy of all praise:
responsum-i: For from thee hath arisen the son of justice,
versus: Pray for the people, intervene for the clerics, intercede for the devoted female sex: so that all should know your help, whoever celebrates your holy commemoration.
